page.title: 19MARKETS IN ST.HELIER
page.content: The {Central Market}is an attractive, spacious Victorian granite building with distinCtive red iron gates and grilles and a glass domed roof.Its 37 permanent stalls and shops create a colourful scene, for 10 sell fruit and vegetables and 5 flowers or seeds. The central fountain with its goldfish pond is a popular meeting place and around it the flower stalls do a brisk trade, especially in carnations. The market has its own Post Office and 5 butchers and 4 bakers or other food shops. The shop most used by 23, 11-12 year old girls sells stickers,perfumed articles, jewellery and clothes. The market is only closed on Sundays and Thursday afternoons. The{Fish Market}is nearby: it has 4 fish and 2 fruit and vegetable stalls, a butcher, a cafe and a fishing tackle shop. {
